alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued November 20 at 4:15PM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will bring dangerously high surf to exposed north facing shores, and high surf to west facing shores. The swell will gradually diminish and turn more northerly on Tuesday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves near 25 feet across north and west facing shores of Niihau, and north facing shores of Kauai, Oahu and Molokai. * WHERE...Niihau, Oahu North Shore, Kauai North, Koolau Windward, Molokai Windward and Molokai North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore
